goal:
EUMEPS is the European Manufacturers Association of EPS insulation and EPS Packaging. It represents the interests of all major EPS producers throughout Europe.
EUMEPS members are the national EPS associations. In this way EUMEPS membership indirectly employs about 60.000 people across Europe, mainly with SME companies. The installation of EPS insulation products accounts for an estimated 300,000 manyears.
EUMEPS does scientific research into the fields of energy efficiency in buildings, sustainable construction and packaging to contribute to the European debate on behalf of the members.
EUMEPS is active at EU level to advocate the benefits of energy efficiency in buildings.
EUMEPS also works at international level to help set-up an effective framework for recycling of EPS foam and to exchange information on the benefits of energy efficiency of buildings.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Development, Education, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation
euInitiatives: all insulation and packaging related EU initiatives
